Reviews.Title: works ok a webcam
Reviews.Author: ursoft2
Reviews.Content: I hooked it up as a webcam. It works fine for that. Video and audio are ok. The view finder is blurry. I haven't tried it as an independent camera yet.

Reviews.Title: its a fake
Reviews.Author: my sig, lol
Reviews.Content: yep, its the size of a key chain toy. completely fake. there are 2 lites that work to make it seem real. but you know its fake cuz the viewing screen is hollow and blurry, theres nothing there. and if you just sqeeze this thing itl fall apart. literaly. it comes with a couple real usb connects, but even these are cheap as they are loose. first fake thing i ever bought off amazon.  :(
